16
00:01:03,640 --> 00:01:04,839
与道共鸣 -> beresonansi dengan Dao.

17
00:01:05,640 --> 00:01:06,719
道生一 -> Dao melahirkan satu.

18
00:01:19,640 --> 00:01:20,759
生二 -> Satu melahirkan dua.

19
00:01:28,080 --> 00:01:28,719
二生三 -> Dua melahirkan tiga.

20
00:02:00,640 --> 00:02:01,999
三道仙气 -> Tiga Energi Abadi?

21
00:02:03,680 --> 00:02:04,879
以天劫洗练 -> Setelah melewati petaka langit,

22
00:02:05,320 --> 00:02:06,759
他反倒重回巅峰 -> dia malah kembali ke puncak.

23
00:02:07,560 --> 00:02:08,758
是又有突破 -> Ada terobosan lagi?

24
00:02:28,560 --> 00:02:30,239
三生万物 -> Tiga melahirkan segalanya!

25
00:03:03,440 --> 00:03:04,399
既为天劫 -> Karena ini petaka langit,

26
00:03:05,080 --> 00:03:06,319
岂能不拷问道心 -> mana mungkin tidak menguji hati Dao.

27
00:03:08,320 --> 00:03:09,639
果然尚未结束 -> Benar saja, belum berakhir.

28
00:03:28,680 --> 00:03:30,319
罪纹腾空自生感应 -> Pola Dosa membubung ke udara, menimbulkan resonansi.

29
00:03:32,040 --> 00:03:33,319
此劫中所见 -> Yang dilihat dari petaka ini 

30
00:03:34,240 --> 00:03:35,519
定与我血脉有关 -> pasti berhubungan dengan darah keturunanku.

31
00:03:59,200 --> 00:04:00,599
果然又是此地 -> Benar saja tempat ini lagi.

32
00:04:27,080 --> 00:04:29,439
以昔日大战之景来扰我心神 -> Mengganggu pikiranku dengan gambaran perang sebelumnya.

33
00:04:31,760 --> 00:04:32,799
既入战阵 -> Karena sudah memasuki formasi perang,

34
00:04:34,080 --> 00:04:35,279
自当杀 -> tentu saja harus membunuh musuh.

35
00:04:43,480 --> 00:04:44,559
可惜我之道 -> Sayangnya ajaranku 

36
00:04:45,440 --> 00:04:46,679
只问当战否 -> hanya bertanya haruskah bertempur,

37
00:04:47,640 --> 00:04:48,799
不问胜负 -> tidak bertanya menang atau kalah.

38
00:04:49,800 --> 00:04:51,039
因为我 -> Karena aku 

39
00:04:53,160 --> 00:04:53,999
必胜 -> pasti menang.

40
00:06:24,920 --> 00:06:26,359
那湖底的女仙 -> Peri di dasar danau?

41
00:06:27,560 --> 00:06:29,759
是天劫激发其残存法力 -> Petaka merangsang kekuatan sihirnya

42
00:06:30,240 --> 00:06:31,359
还是因果纠缠 -> atau terjerat karma?

43
00:06:32,800 --> 00:06:34,599
死后真灵仍愿助我 -> Roh sejati masih membantuku setelah mati.

44
00:06:40,760 --> 00:06:42,239
九重天第一重 -> Tingkat pertama dari Langit Tingkat 9

45
00:06:43,520 --> 00:06:44,679
已过 -> telah dilewati.

46
00:06:45,320 --> 00:06:46,359
九重天 -> Langit Tingkat 9?

47
00:06:47,160 --> 00:06:48,319
说是其后还有八关 -> Katanya setelah ini, masih ada delapan tahap.

48
00:06:49,560 --> 00:06:50,959
三道仙气绕体 -> Tiga Energi Abadi mengelilingi tubuh,

49
00:06:51,960 --> 00:06:54,519
自可搜取天地本源补充己身 -> dapat menyerap sumber energi langit dan bumi untuk diri sendiri.

50
00:06:55,440 --> 00:06:56,719
你有重重险关 -> Kau memberi rintangan,

51
00:06:57,680 --> 00:06:59,039
我便闯关夺隘 -> aku akan menerobos semuanya.

52
00:07:49,920 --> 00:07:50,719
无 -> Hampa?

53
00:07:51,360 --> 00:07:52,519
又是此钟 -> Lonceng ini lagi.

54
00:07:54,400 --> 00:07:54,799
你要鸣响 -> Kau ingin berbunyi,

55
00:07:56,200 --> 00:07:57,559
我便要你鸣响个痛快 -> maka aku akan membiarkanmu berbunyi hingga puas.

56
00:08:09,560 --> 00:08:10,879
没有看到雷劫液 -> Tidak melihat Cairan Petaka Petir?

57
00:08:12,640 --> 00:08:14,759
难不成九重天还不是最后一关 -> Jangan-jangan Langit Tingkat 9 

58
00:08:26,960 --> 00:08:28,239
黑暗牢笼 -> Penjara Kegelapan?

59
00:08:31,000 --> 00:08:33,158
我闯过一次就可以再闯一次 -> Aku pernah menerobos satu kali maka bisa kuterobos sekali lagi.

60
00:08:47,000 --> 00:08:49,799
当初尚需凝聚全身之力才可脱困 -> Waktu itu, perlu mengumpulkan seluruh tenaga untuk dapat keluar.

61
00:08:52,200 --> 00:08:53,119
如今 -> Sekarang...

62
00:08:57,320 --> 00:08:58,439
虽为黑暗牢笼 -> Meski di Penjara Kegelapan,

63
00:08:59,280 --> 00:09:00,719
毕竟仍在天劫之中 -> tapi bagaimanapun, aku berada di tengah petaka,

64
00:09:01,160 --> 00:09:02,759
必有应劫之机缘 -> maka pasti ada peluang dalam menghadapi petaka.

65
00:09:20,960 --> 00:09:22,319
发生了什么变故 -> Terjadi perlubahan seperti apa?

66
00:09:23,120 --> 00:09:24,799
怎么一下子跑出来这么多 -> Kenapa dalam sekejap keluar sebanyak ini?

67
00:10:07,160 --> 00:10:08,879
虽说元神乃自我心向 -> Meski roh primordial berasal dari hati tidak terikat oleh tubuh,

68
00:10:09,520 --> 00:10:10,679
无需受肉身束缚 -> tapi seharusnya ada kebiasaan tubuh yang bersatu,

69
00:10:11,480 --> 00:10:13,959
可总该有些身心一体的习惯才对 -> dan pikiran bersatu.

70
00:10:15,160 --> 00:10:16,559
这些怪物的行动 -> Kenapa gerakan monster-monster ini

71
00:10:17,280 --> 00:10:18,759
怎会如此诡异难测 -> sangat aneh dan sulit diprediksi?

72
00:10:52,640 --> 00:10:54,599
难不成这些怪物 -> Apakah monster-monster ini...

73
00:11:36,800 --> 00:11:37,159
你们看 -> Kalian lihatlah.

74
00:11:37,760 --> 00:11:39,679
那荒怎么站在雷域之中一动不动 -> Kenapa Huang berdiri diam di tengah wilayah petir?

75
00:11:41,400 --> 00:11:42,519
好似没了意识一般 -> Seperti kehilangan kesadaran.

76
00:11:43,400 --> 00:11:45,519
难道荒的元神已被雷劫击散 -> Apakah jiwa Huang telah tersebar disambar petir, 

77
00:11:46,000 --> 00:11:46,879
只余肉身了 -> hanya sisa tubuhnya?

78
00:11:48,360 --> 00:11:49,639
斩杀他的肉身 -> Sekarang waktunya membunuh tubuhnya.

79
00:11:50,040 --> 00:11:51,039
就在此刻 -> Ayo, kita pergi juga.

80
00:11:51,200 --> 00:11:52,079
走 咱们也去 -> Siapa yang berani menyentuh sahabatku?

81
00:11:55,080 --> 00:11:56,039
谁敢动我兄弟 -> Harus minta persetujuan dulu dariku!

82
00:11:56,680 --> 00:11:58,639
直问我曹雨生是否答应 -> Dasar gendut.

83
00:11:59,320 --> 00:12:00,679
就凭你这死胖子 -> Kau ingin menghadapi kami sendirian?

84
00:12:01,360 --> 00:12:02,639
也想螳臂挡 -> Jangan memanggilku gendut.

85
00:12:03,560 --> 00:12:05,079
不要叫我死胖子 -> Formasi Pembunuhan Ketiga!

86
00:12:06,120 --> 00:12:07,479
第三杀阵 -> Berkumpul menjadi dua kelompok.

87
00:12:08,120 --> 00:12:09,039
兵分两路 -> Yang terpenting adalah membunuh Huang.

88
00:12:09,240 --> 00:12:10,159
斩荒要紧 -> Sahabat yang baik.

89
00:12:14,280 --> 00:12:15,199
好兄弟 -> Aku hampir tidak tahan lagi.

90
00:12:15,320 --> 00:12:16,719
我快撑不住了 -> Kalau hebat, semuanya hadapi aku.

91
00:12:17,280 --> 00:12:18,959
有本事全冲我来 -> Berhenti!

92
00:12:51,920 --> 00:12:53,439
停停停停 -> Sangat berbahaya.

93
00:12:56,880 --> 00:12:57,679
好险 -> Tanpa peduli siapa pun, yang mencampuri petaka petir,

94
00:12:58,840 --> 00:13:00,119
看来无论何人 -> pasti akan mendapat hukuman langit.

95
00:13:00,640 --> 00:13:01,679
插手雷劫 -> Siapa yang bilang mau membunuh sahabatku?

96
00:13:01,960 --> 00:13:02,799
必受天谴 -> Pergilah.

97
00:13:08,160 --> 00:13:09,839
谁说要斩我兄弟来着 -> Beraksi lah.

98
00:13:09,920 --> 00:13:10,719
去呀 -> Jangan membuatku meremehkan kalian.

99
00:13:12,080 --> 00:13:13,239
动手啊 -> Siapa?

100
00:13:13,640 --> 00:13:15,319
可别让我看不起你们 -> Baunya sekali.

101
00:13:16,560 --> 00:13:17,119
是谁 -> Kenapa dia bisa bergerak bebas di wilayah petir?

102
00:13:18,280 --> 00:13:19,079
好臭 -> Bau mayat ini...

103
00:13:27,480 --> 00:13:29,559
他怎能在雷域畅行无阻 -> Aku mengerti.

104
00:13:34,920 --> 00:13:35,879
这尸臭 -> Dia pasti meminjam energi kematian Tanah Nether untuk menutupi energi vital itu.

105
00:13:36,760 --> 00:13:37,639
明自了 -> Itu sebabnya, petaka belum mendeteksi ini.

106
00:13:38,400 --> 00:13:40,519
他必是借了冥土死气掩盖生机 -> Sahabatku.

107
00:13:41,040 --> 00:13:42,399
故此天劫未察 -> Kau cepat bangun.

108
00:13:49,920 --> 00:13:50,879
好兄弟 -> Jika begini terus, makhluk ini akan semakin kuat.

109
00:13:51,360 --> 00:13:52,599
你快醒过来啊 -> Monster yang terperangkap di sana,

110
00:14:33,840 --> 00:14:36,159
这样下去这东西只会越来越强 -> momentumnya tidak lebih lemah dari makhluk di belakang.

111
00:14:52,080 --> 00:14:53,119
那里关的怪物 -> Saat ini terpaksa mengusir harimau, melahap serigala.

112
00:14:54,080 --> 00:14:56,199
气势丝毫不弱于身后的家伙 -> Bertahan hidup dalam kekacauan.

Dialogue: 0,0:00:12.65,0:00:14.04,Default,,0,0,0,,Tiga Energi Abadi mengelilingi tubuh
Dialogue: 0,0:00:14.65,0:00:17.19,Default,,0,0,0,,dapat menyerap sumber energi langit dan bumi untuk diri sendiri.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:18.25,0:00:19.49,Default,,0,0,0,,Kau memberi rintangan,
Dialogue: 0,0:00:20.05,0:00:21.39,Default,,0,0,0,,aku akan menerobos semuanya.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:27.05,0:00:28.89,Default,,0,0,0,,Bagaimana dia bisa bergerak bebas di wilayah petir?
Dialogue: 0,0:00:29.60,0:00:31.89,Default,,0,0,0,,Saudara, cepat bangun!
Dialogue: 0,0:00:42.50,0:00:44.54,Default,,0,0,0,,Meskipun kau memiliki tiga Energi Abadi,
Dialogue: 0,0:00:45.45,0:00:47.04,Default,,0,0,0,,tidak ada gunanya jika kau jatuh di sini.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:47.75,0:00:49.04,Default,,0,0,0,,Tubuhmu akan menjadi milikku.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:03.15,0:01:03.94,Default,,0,0,0,,Kau sudah tiba.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:04.60,0:01:05.79,Default,,0,0,0,,Dengar-dengar Huang dalam masalah.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:06.15,0:01:06.89,Default,,0,0,0,,Aku datang untuk membantu.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:07.90,0:01:08.74,Default,,0,0,0,,Itu tidak berguna.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:09.55,0:01:10.39,Default,,0,0,0,,Di dalam petaka,
Dialogue: 0,0:01:10.95,0:01:13.24,Default,,0,0,0,,kecuali orang yang bersembunyi di balik energi kematian,
Dialogue: 0,0:01:14.40,0:01:16.84,Default,,0,0,0,,serangan hanya akan menggores permukaan.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:17.60,0:01:18.79,Default,,0,0,0,,Tidak ada cara lain.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:26.75,0:01:28.39,Default,,0,0,0,,Seandainya kelinci kecil itu ada.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:28.80,0:01:30.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Mungkin dia punya ide gila.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:31.05,0:01:31.84,Default,,0,0,0,,Dia,
Dialogue: 0,0:01:32.35,0:01:34.04,Default,,0,0,0,,muncul saat ada makanan.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:34.30,0:01:35.94,Default,,0,0,0,,Hilang saat ada masalah.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:36.55,0:01:37.64,Default,,0,0,0,,Apa ide yang bisa dia miliki?
Dialogue: 0,0:01:38.20,0:01:39.44,Default,,0,0,0,,Walaupun ada secercah harapan,
Dialogue: 0,0:01:39.70,0:01:40.64,Default,,0,0,0,,dia tidak akan menyerah.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:56.45,0:01:58.14,Default,,0,0,0,,Apakah pantas menghadapi petaka dengan resiko besar?
Dialogue: 0,0:01:58.55,0:01:59.54,Default,,0,0,0,,Apakah itu layak?
Dialogue: 0,0:02:05.25,0:02:05.94,Default,,0,0,0,,Saudara Chang Gong,
Dialogue: 0,0:02:06.35,0:02:07.09,Default,,0,0,0,,aku ikut.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:35.85,0:02:39.99,Default,,0,0,0,,Kesalahanmu adalah mengusik Surga.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:44.95,0:02:46.14,Default,,0,0,0,,Dia telah bangun.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:54.85,0:02:55.24,Default,,0,0,0,,Ah.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:56.10,0:02:57.59,Default,,0,0,0,,Mengapa dia jadi tampak tua?
Dialogue: 0,0:02:58.25,0:02:58.74,Default,,0,0,0,,Gendut.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:59.30,0:03:00.44,Default,,0,0,0,,Apa matamu?
Dialogue: 0,0:03:01.30,0:03:02.94,Default,,0,0,0,,Ini adalah Tetua suku Delapan Lengan.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:03.00,0:03:04.04,Default,,0,0,0,,Pembantu yang aku panggil.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:09.00,0:03:10.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Dia adalah orang yang kau cari.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:12.00,0:03:14.14,Default,,0,0,0,,Mereka teringat pada Huang yang telah memberi mereka ranting willow.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:15.00,0:03:16.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Mereka mau membantu.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:16.95,0:03:18.39,Default,,0,0,0,,Aku bilang pasti kau punya rencana.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:21.40,0:03:22.54,Default,,0,0,0,,Hanya saja, takut Tetua ini...
Dialogue: 0,0:03:22.85,0:03:24.84,Default,,0,0,0,,akan menggunakan tubuh {\i1}Heavenly Deity{\i0} untuk menerobos wilayah petir.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:25.15,0:03:25.94,Default,,0,0,0,,tidak akan bertahan lama.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:30.85,0:03:32.19,Default,,0,0,0,,Demi orang luar,
Dialogue: 0,0:03:32.25,0:03:33.54,Default,,0,0,0,,nekat menghadapi petaka.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:34.90,0:03:36.84,Default,,0,0,0,,Apa keuntungan yang kau dapatkan dari mereka?
Dialogue: 0,0:03:39.65,0:03:42.74,Default,,0,0,0,,Orang ini adalah penyelamat dari keturunan Ancient Immortal.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:43.65,0:03:45.69,Default,,0,0,0,,Aku tidak akan membiarkanmu menyakiti dia.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:54.30,0:03:55.54,Default,,0,0,0,,Hahaha.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:56.40,0:03:58.54,Default,,0,0,0,,Kupikir kau punya cara khusus.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:59.20,0:04:01.54,Default,,0,0,0,,Ternyata hanya bertahan dari pengikisan Ancient Immortal.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:02.05,0:04:03.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Memaksakan diri keluar.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:15.65,0:04:16.79,Default,,0,0,0,,Jika makhluk di belakang itu,
Dialogue: 0,0:04:17.20,0:04:18.39,Default,,0,0,0,,tahu kapan harus mundur, itu yang terbaik.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:19.55,0:04:21.54,Default,,0,0,0,,Agar tidak benar-benar menjadi masalah lebih besar.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:38.85,0:04:40.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Sepertinya, aku harus bertarung.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:45.25,0:04:47.04,Default,,0,0,0,,Di sini, jiwa-jiwa telah terkurung bertahun-tahun.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:48.15,0:04:49.09,Default,,0,0,0,,Mereka sangat membutuhkan energi Dao.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:49.15,0:04:50.44,Default,,0,0,0,,Semua merasa sangat terdesak.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:51.90,0:04:53.44,Default,,0,0,0,,Aku tidak percaya kau mengabaikannya.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:49.95,0:05:51.89,Default,,0,0,0,,Dua monster memakan segala sesuatu.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:52.65,0:05:54.09,Default,,0,0,0,,Saatnya pergi saat mereka bertarung.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:54.35,0:05:55.14,Default,,0,0,0,,Kabur dari sini.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:07.05,0:06:07.74,Default,,0,0,0,,Hancurkan!
Dialogue: 0,0:06:18.45,0:06:21.44,Default,,0,0,0,,Petaka sembilan lapis telah berlalu.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:24.65,0:06:26.09,Default,,0,0,0,,Aku rasa tidak ada yang bisa menghentikanku.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:26.30,0:06:27.54,Default,,0,0,0,,Kau akan mati!
Dialogue: 0,0:06:27.95,0:06:28.59,Default,,0,0,0,,Tidak!
Dialogue: 0,0:06:37.90,0:06:39.09,Default,,0,0,0,,Yang seharusnya mati,
Dialogue: 0,0:06:39.50,0:06:40.44,Default,,0,0,0,,adalah kau!
Dialogue: 0,0:06:49.75,0:06:50.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Beku!
Dialogue: 0,0:07:21.60,0:07:22.94,Default,,0,0,0,,Terima kasih, senior, telah mengambil risiko besar
Dialogue: 0,0:07:23.15,0:07:24.49,Default,,0,0,0,,untuk memperpanjang waktu untukku.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:25.05,0:07:25.89,Default,,0,0,0,,Kalian jaga senior dulu.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:26.75,0:07:27.84,Default,,0,0,0,,Aku akan ambil Cairan Petaka Langit.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:37.65,0:07:39.44,Default,,0,0,0,,Aku mendengar bahwa Petaka Langit ada sembilan tahap maksimum,
Dialogue: 0,0:07:40.05,0:07:41.29,Default,,0,0,0,,sepuluh kualitas sempurna.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:42.70,0:07:44.14,Default,,0,0,0,,Sepertinya apa yang aku hadapi hari ini
Dialogue: 0,0:07:44.70,0:07:46.19,Default,,0,0,0,,adalah Petaka yang kesepuluh.
Dialogue: 0,0:08:03.35,0:08:06.84,Default,,0,0,0,,Tak kusangka, lapisan atas wilayah petir ini begitu penuh kehidupan.
Dialogue: 0,0:08:10.25,0:08:12.24,Default,,0,0,0,,Pangkalan Pemotong Abadi ini bukan tempat terakhir?
Dialogue: 0,0:08:22.95,0:08:25.99,Default,,0,0,0,,Sepertinya kekuatanku masih belum cukup untuk menarik perhatiannya.
Dialogue: 0,0:08:36.40,0:08:37.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Berkilau keemasan.
Dialogue: 0,0:08:38.60,0:08:41.04,Default,,0,0,0,,Tidak tahu apa perbedaan dengan Cairan Petaka Ungu sebelumnya.
Dialogue: 0,0:08:46.85,0:08:48.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Lebih pekat dan lebih halus.
Dialogue: 0,0:08:48.85,0:08:49.54,Default,,0,0,0,,Satu tetes
Dialogue: 0,0:08:50.45,0:08:52.89,Default,,0,0,0,,setara dengan segenggam Cairan Petaka Ungu sebelumnya.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:08.75,0:09:09.54,Default,,0,0,0,,Gendut!
Dialogue: 0,0:09:10.15,0:09:10.94,Default,,0,0,0,,Kau bilang orang tua itu
Dialogue: 0,0:09:10.95,0:09:11.94,Default,,0,0,0,,tidak akan terluka, kan?
Dialogue: 0,0:09:12.80,0:09:14.74,Default,,0,0,0,,Jika dia benar-benar mati di sini,
Dialogue: 0,0:09:15.35,0:09:17.64,Default,,0,0,0,,apa yang harus aku katakan pada suku Delapan Lengan?
Dialogue: 0,0:09:17.95,0:09:19.14,Default,,0,0,0,,Satu nyawa untuk satu nyawa.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:19.90,0:09:20.84,Default,,0,0,0,,Biarkan kau pergi untuk meminta maaf.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:21.70,0:09:22.09,Default,,0,0,0,,Tidak.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:22.35,0:09:23.44,Default,,0,0,0,,Lebih baik kirim kau.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:23.55,0:09:24.44,Default,,0,0,0,,Akan lebih menguntungkan.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:34.05,0:09:35.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Kalian masih berani maju?
Dialogue: 0,0:09:35.40,0:09:37.94,Default,,0,0,0,,Tidakkah takut Huang akan menangkap kalian semua?
Dialogue: 0,0:09:38.55,0:09:40.39,Default,,0,0,0,,Kami, lebih dari sepuluh {\i1}Heavenly Deity{\i0} berada di sini.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:40.85,0:09:43.10,Default,,0,0,0,,Dia tidak memiliki petaka yang bisa diandalkan.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:43.90,0:09:45.54,Default,,0,0,0,,Apa artinya tiga Energi Abadi itu?
Dialogue: 0,0:09:46.25,0:09:47.29,Default,,0,0,0,,Mau bagaimana pun,
Dialogue: 0,0:09:47.60,0:09:50.14,Default,,0,0,0,,dia hanyalah seorang pemuda di {\i1}True Self Realm{\i0}.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:00.55,0:10:01.69,Default,,0,0,0,,Dengan kalian semua,
Dialogue: 0,0:10:14.40,0:10:17.74,Default,,0,0,0,,Kabarnya Cairan Petaka Emas ini berasal dari kolam Abadi kuno.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:18.30,0:10:20.29,Default,,0,0,0,,Meminumnya sangat bermanfaat untuk kultivasi.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:20.75,0:10:21.64,Default,,0,0,0,,Obat sakti ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:10:22.10,0:10:23.99,Default,,0,0,0,,bagaimana bisa disia-siakan oleh kaum muda?
Dialogue: 0,0:10:24.60,0:10:25.64,Default,,0,0,0,,Serahkan Cairan Petaka itu.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:27.55,0:10:28.69,Default,,0,0,0,,Kalian juga menginginkannya?
Dialogue: 0,0:10:29.40,0:10:30.94,Default,,0,0,0,,Kalau begitu, aku akan menyuguhkan kalian.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:52.85,0:10:53.79,Default,,0,0,0,,Cairan Petaka itu
Dialogue: 0,0:10:54.00,0:10:56.29,Default,,0,0,0,,dapat mengurangi pengikisan kekuatan Ancient Immortal.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:56.90,0:10:57.84,Default,,0,0,0,,Harta berharga!
Dialogue: 0,0:10:58.45,0:10:59.49,Default,,0,0,0,,Kami selamat!
Dialogue: 0,0:11:03.70,0:11:04.19,Default,,0,0,0,,Anak muda,
Dialogue: 0,0:11:04.65,0:11:05.74,Default,,0,0,0,,serahkan Cairan Petaka itu.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:06.60,0:11:07.14,Default,,0,0,0,,Saudara Huang,
Dialogue: 0,0:11:07.65,0:11:08.69,Default,,0,0,0,,Kita berdua bersatu melawan musuh.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:16.20,0:11:18.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Luka batinku selama bertahun-tahun,
Dialogue: 0,0:11:18.65,0:11:20.04,Default,,0,0,0,,dapat teratasi dengan bantuanmu.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:20.25,0:11:22.04,Default,,0,0,0,,Hari ini kita bisa terbebas dari penyiksaan.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:23.20,0:11:24.54,Default,,0,0,0,,Hari ini, aku ada di sini,
Dialogue: 0,0:11:24.95,0:11:27.99,Default,,0,0,0,,aku tidak akan membiarkan siapa pun menyakiti kalian.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:32.10,0:11:33.14,Default,,0,0,0,,Dia benar-benar sudah sembuh.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:34.05,0:11:34.84,Default,,0,0,0,,Ini benar-benar bermanfaat.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:35.15,0:11:36.19,Default,,0,0,0,,Kalau gitu, kita perlu merebutnya.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:36.45,0:11:38.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Tapi dia sudah tidak menderita pengikisan.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:38.75,0:11:40.39,Default,,0,0,0,,Kami tidak bisa bertarung dengan kekuatan penuhnya.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:42.50,0:11:43.69,Default,,0,0,0,,Tidak perlu saling memperebutkan.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:44.55,0:11:45.49,Default,,0,0,0,,Cairan Petaka sudah tidak ada.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:46.50,0:11:47.44,Default,,0,0,0,,Jika kalian ingin merampas,
Dialogue: 0,0:11:47.85,0:11:48.49,Default,,0,0,0,,tidak ada kesempatan.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:50.20,0:11:51.44,Default,,0,0,0,,Asalkan aku tidak mati,
Dialogue: 0,0:11:52.05,0:11:53.59,Default,,0,0,0,,di masa depan pasti ada petaka lagi.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:54.30,0:11:55.14,Default,,0,0,0,,Cairan Petaka itu
Dialogue: 0,0:11:55.90,0:11:57.14,Default,,0,0,0,,pasti akan muncul kembali.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:58.00,0:11:59.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Berani mengancam kami?
Dialogue: 0,0:12:02.15,0:12:02.74,Default,,0,0,0,,hati-hati!
Dialogue: 0,0:12:03.15,0:12:04.09,Default,,0,0,0,,Jika kau berani menyentuh Huang,
Dialogue: 0,0:12:04.45,0:12:06.45,Default,,0,0,0,,berarti kau berhadapan dengan kami, penduduk Ancient Immortal.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:07.35,0:12:08.14,Default,,0,0,0,,Anak muda,
Dialogue: 0,0:12:08.45,0:12:11.39,Default,,0,0,0,,Mulai sekarang, kau adalah tamu terhormat bagi kami penduduk Ancient Immortal.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:12.45,0:12:14.59,Default,,0,0,0,,Suku kami ingin mengundangmu ke tanah leluhur.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:14.95,0:12:16.24,Default,,0,0,0,,Jangan rebut tamu kami.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:16.80,0:12:17.99,Default,,0,0,0,,Dia adalah tamu terhormat kami.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:23.20,0:12:24.44,Default,,0,0,0,,Tempat suci ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:12:24.75,0:12:26.99,Default,,0,0,0,,awalnya tidak boleh dimasuki oleh orang luar.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:27.45,0:12:31.19,Default,,0,0,0,,Namun, anak muda memiliki ikatan dengan leluhur.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:31.65,0:12:33.24,Default,,0,0,0,,Dan juga merupakan penyelamat bagi suku kami.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:33.85,0:12:35.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Kami bersedia mengorbankan segalanya
Dialogue: 0,0:12:35.85,0:12:37.74,Default,,0,0,0,,untuk melindungi kalian saat berlatih di sini.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:38.15,0:12:40.74,Default,,0,0,0,,Sampai Dao Abadi dihadapkan di dunia.
Dialogue: 0,0:13:04.55,0:13:05.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Dewa Willow,
Dialogue: 0,0:13:06.45,0:13:07.34,Default,,0,0,0,,aku datang!
Dialogue: 0,0:13:19.45,0:13:20.84,Default,,0,0,0,,Memunculkan wujud Dharma.
Dialogue: 0,0:13:21.40,0:13:22.94,Default,,0,0,0,,Cabang-cabang leluhur mulai bangkit.
Dialogue: 0,0:13:27.90,0:13:29.04,Default,,0,0,0,,Kau adalah yang kedua
Dialogue: 0,0:13:30.00,0:13:31.34,Default,,0,0,0,,yang membangunkanku.
Dialogue: 0,0:13:32.95,0:13:34.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Ada yang lain yang bisa membangunkanmu?
Dialogue: 0,0:13:35.25,0:13:37.94,Default,,0,0,0,,Ada seseorang datang membawa guci.
Dialogue: 0,0:13:40.15,0:13:41.04,Default,,0,0,0,,Guci?
Dialogue: 0,0:13:45.05,0:13:45.94,Default,,0,0,0,,Mungkinkah dia?
Dialogue: 0,0:13:47.00,0:13:48.04,Default,,0,0,0,,Siapa sebenarnya orang ini?
Dialogue: 0,0:13:48.35,0:13:49.24,Default,,0,0,0,,Dari mana asalnya?
Dialogue: 0,0:13:50.10,0:13:51.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Orang itu bernama Ye.
Dialogue: 0,0:13:51.65,0:13:55.29,Default,,0,0,0,,Dia tidak berasal dari masa lalu atau masa kini.
Dialogue: 0,0:13:56.45,0:13:57.24,Default,,0,0,0,,Mengapa dia datang?
Dialogue: 0,0:13:57.85,0:13:59.04,Default,,0,0,0,,Mengambil cabang ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:13:59.35,0:14:00.94,Default,,0,0,0,,memungkinkan aku hidup kembali.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:01.50,0:14:02.64,Default,,0,0,0,,Kedatangannya
Dialogue: 0,0:14:03.15,0:14:05.09,Default,,0,0,0,,membantuku melampaui batas.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:05.55,0:14:06.84,Default,,0,0,0,,Dapat terealisasi.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:07.30,0:14:08.89,Default,,0,0,0,,Namun, aku bukan wujud asli.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:09.45,0:14:10.69,Default,,0,0,0,,Ingatanku terbatas.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:12.05,0:14:14.24,Default,,0,0,0,,Ku harap suatu hari aku bisa benar-benar bertemu dengannya.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:15.10,0:14:16.04,Default,,0,0,0,,Tanya langsung.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:16.80,0:14:17.94,Default,,0,0,0,,{\i1}True Self Realm.{\i0}
Dialogue: 0,0:14:18.70,0:14:20.55,Default,,0,0,0,,Karena kamu telah mencapai tingkat ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:14:21.80,0:14:23.55,Default,,0,0,0,,apakah kamu mengetahui jalan hidupmu,
Dialogue: 0,0:14:23.80,0:14:24.79,Default,,0,0,0,,Akan ke mana?
Dialogue: 0,0:14:26.20,0:14:27.05,Default,,0,0,0,,{\i1}Melepaskan diri.{\i0}
Dialogue: 0,0:14:28.30,0:14:29.69,Default,,0,0,0,,{\i1}Hampa dan kabur.{\i0}
Dialogue: 0,0:14:32.70,0:14:33.49,Default,,0,0,0,,{\i1}Yang terkuat.{\i0}
Dialogue: 0,0:14:34.35,0:14:35.79,Default,,0,0,0,,{\i1}Sangat tinggi dan jauh.{\i0}
Dialogue: 0,0:14:36.90,0:14:37.54,Default,,0,0,0,,{\i1}Kekekalan.{\i0}
Dialogue: 0,0:14:38.00,0:14:39.54,Default,,0,0,0,,{\i1}Dengan buah menjadi sebab{\i0}.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:41.25,0:14:42.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Apakah kau tahu,
Dialogue: 0,0:14:42.85,0:14:44.09,Default,,0,0,0,,apa itu kebenaran?
Dialogue: 0,0:14:47.85,0:14:48.59,Default,,0,0,0,,Tekuni satu jalan,
Dialogue: 0,0:14:49.25,0:14:50.24,Default,,0,0,0,,berjalan di satu jalan.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:52.55,0:14:53.29,Default,,0,0,0,,Aku mengerti.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:55.30,0:14:56.19,Default,,0,0,0,,Keinginanku
Dialogue: 0,0:14:57.10,0:14:58.54,Default,,0,0,0,,adalah untuk memahami antara hidup dan mati,
Dialogue: 0,0:14:59.00,0:15:00.29,Default,,0,0,0,,memahami keajaiban diriku.
Dialogue: 0,0:15:04.50,0:15:05.79,Default,,0,0,0,,Bagaimana cara memahaminya?
Dialogue: 0,0:15:07.15,0:15:08.64,Default,,0,0,0,,Kau telah menjalani reinkarnasi di Desa Batu.
Dialogue: 0,0:15:09.85,0:15:11.14,Default,,0,0,0,,Aku ingin mempelajari cara reinkarnasimu.
Dialogue: 0,0:15:12.05,0:15:13.49,Default,,0,0,0,,Mencari jalan menembus hidup dan mati.
Dialogue: 0,0:15:14.95,0:15:17.89,Default,,0,0,0,,Teknik ini berhubungan dengan batas kehidupan dan mati.
Dialogue: 0,0:15:18.40,0:15:20.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Harus ada yang dipahami tentang keuntungan dan kerugian.
Dialogue: 0,0:15:21.05,0:15:22.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Hidup dan mati saling bergantung.
Dialogue: 0,0:15:24.55,0:15:25.64,Default,,0,0,0,,Murid akan mengingat ini di hati.

srt:
1
00:00:12,680 --> 00:00:14,079
三道仙气绕体

2
00:00:14,640 --> 00:00:17,199
自可擢取天地本源补充己身

3
00:00:18,240 --> 00:00:19,519
你有重重险关

4
00:00:20,040 --> 00:00:21,399
我便闯关夺隘

5
00:00:27,080 --> 00:00:28,879
他怎能在雷域畅行无阻

6
00:00:29,600 --> 00:00:31,879
好兄弟你快醒过来啊

7
00:00:42,520 --> 00:00:44,559
修出三道仙气又如何

8
00:00:45,480 --> 00:00:47,039
还不是殒落于此

9
00:00:47,760 --> 00:00:49,079
肉身为我所得

10
00:01:03,120 --> 00:01:03,839
你也来了

11
00:01:04,560 --> 00:01:05,759
听闻荒兄有难

12
00:01:09,520 --> 00:01:10,359
雷劫之内

13
00:01:10,840 --> 00:01:13,159
除了眼前那借死气藏身的家伙

14
00:01:14,320 --> 00:01:16,759
攻击只是隔靴搔痒

15
00:01:17,520 --> 00:01:18,719
就没有别的办法了

16
00:01:26,640 --> 00:01:28,319
要是那小兔子在就好了

17
00:01:28,720 --> 00:01:30,279
说不定能有什么鬼主意

18
00:01:31,000 --> 00:01:31,799
她

19
00:01:32,240 --> 00:01:33,959
到吃东西就出现

20
00:01:34,200 --> 00:01:35,759
到有事就消失

21
00:01:36,320 --> 00:01:37,599
她能有什么主意

22
00:01:39,600 --> 00:01:40,559
也不言弃

23
00:01:56,360 --> 00:01:58,039
冒死强闯雷劫

24
00:01:58,480 --> 00:01:58,839
值得吗

25
00:02:05,160 --> 00:02:05,999
长弓兄

26
00:02:06,280 --> 00:02:07,039
算我一个

27
00:02:35,560 --> 00:02:39,719
你错就错在不该得罪天国

28
00:02:44,640 --> 00:02:45,839
他醒过来了

29
00:02:54,560 --> 00:02:55,359
啊

30
00:02:55,840 --> 00:02:57,319
这怎么还变老了

31
00:02:58,480 --> 00:02:58,759
胖子

32
00:02:59,000 --> 00:03:00,159
你什么眼神

33
00:03:01,000 --> 00:03:02,679
这是八臂魂族长老

34
00:03:02,720 --> 00:03:03,799
我搬来的救兵

35
00:03:08,720 --> 00:03:10,039
是你找来的

36
00:03:11,720 --> 00:03:13,839
他们念在荒曾赐还柳枝

37
00:03:14,560 --> 00:03:15,919
愿意出手相助

38
00:03:16,480 --> 00:03:17,959
我就说你一定有主意

39
00:03:20,960 --> 00:03:22,079
只怕这长老

40
00:03:22,440 --> 00:03:24,439
以天神之躯擅闯雷域

41
00:03:24,680 --> 00:03:25,479
撑不了多久

42
00:03:30,440 --> 00:03:31,759
为了个外人

43
00:03:31,800 --> 00:03:33,079
强闯雷劫

44
00:03:34,440 --> 00:03:36,399
你收了他们什么好处

45
00:03:39,160 --> 00:03:42,319
此人乃是众仙古遗族的恩人

46
00:03:43,200 --> 00:03:45,239
绝不容你伤他

47
00:03:53,840 --> 00:03:55,079
哈哈哈

48
00:03:55,960 --> 00:03:58,079
还以为你有什么特殊手段

49
00:03:58,760 --> 00:04:01,079
不过是顶着仙古法力侵蚀

50
00:04:15,200 --> 00:04:16,359
若是身后那东西

51
00:04:16,760 --> 00:04:17,958
能知难而退最好

52
00:04:19,120 --> 00:04:21,119
免得真惹出什么更大的麻烦

53
00:04:38,360 --> 00:04:39,879
看来不拼是不行了

54
00:04:44,800 --> 00:04:46,559
此处元神皆被困千万载

55
00:04:47,680 --> 00:04:48,599
对仙道气息之补充

56
00:04:48,680 --> 00:04:49,999
皆是如饥似渴

57
00:04:51,440 --> 00:04:52,959
我不信你无动于衷

58
00:05:49,480 --> 00:05:51,439
两只怪物皆予吞噬一切

59
00:05:52,200 --> 00:05:53,639
正好趁二虎相争

60
00:05:53,880 --> 00:05:54,639
逃离此处

61
00:06:06,600 --> 00:06:07,239
破

62
00:06:18,000 --> 00:06:20,959
九重天劫已过

63
00:06:24,160 --> 00:06:25,639
我看还有何人能拦我

64
00:06:25,840 --> 00:06:27,079
你受死吧

65
00:06:27,440 --> 00:06:28,159
不

66
00:06:37,440 --> 00:06:38,559
该受死的

67
00:06:39,040 --> 00:06:39,959
是你

68
00:06:49,280 --> 00:06:50,079
定

69
00:07:21,080 --> 00:07:22,439
多谢前辈冒偌大风险

70
00:07:22,640 --> 00:07:23,999
替我拖延时间

71
00:07:24,520 --> 00:07:25,399
你们先照顾前辈

72
00:07:26,240 --> 00:07:27,359
我要去取雷劫液

73
00:07:37,160 --> 00:07:38,959
曾闻天劫有九之极尽

74
00:07:39,520 --> 00:07:40,799
十境完美之说

75
00:07:42,200 --> 00:07:43,679
看来今日所遇

76
00:07:44,200 --> 00:07:45,719
就是十重之劫了

77
00:08:02,800 --> 00:08:06,359
没想到雷域顶层竟是如此生机盘然

78
00:08:09,760 --> 00:08:11,759
这斩仙台莫不是最后一关

79
00:08:22,400 --> 00:08:25,479
看来我的实力还不足以惊动它

80
00:08:37,720 --> 00:08:40,158
不知与上次的紫色雷劫液有何区别

81
00:08:45,960 --> 00:08:47,439
更加精华凝练

82
00:08:49,560 --> 00:08:51,839
就抵得上过去一团紫色雷劫液

83
00:09:07,840 --> 00:09:08,679
胖子

84
00:09:10,040 --> 00:09:11,039
不会怎么样吧

85
00:09:11,920 --> 00:09:13,839
他要是真殒命于此

86
00:09:14,440 --> 00:09:16,799
我可怎么向八臂魂族交代啊

87
00:09:17,080 --> 00:09:18,239
一命换一命呗

88
00:09:19,000 --> 00:09:19,999
把你押去谢罪

89
00:09:20,800 --> 00:09:21,199
不

90
00:09:21,480 --> 00:09:22,559
不如把你送过去

91
00:09:22,640 --> 00:09:23,559
还多几斤肉

92
00:09:33,160 --> 00:09:34,439
你们还敢上前

93
00:09:34,520 --> 00:09:37,039
就不怕荒待会将你们一网打尽嘛

94
00:09:37,680 --> 00:09:39,519
我们数十位天神在列

95
00:09:39,960 --> 00:09:41,679
他又再无天劫可依

96
00:09:43,040 --> 00:09:44,679
三道仙气又如何

97
00:09:45,400 --> 00:09:46,399
说到底

98
00:09:46,720 --> 00:09:49,239
不过是一个真神境的小子罢了

99
00:09:59,640 --> 00:10:00,799
就凭你们

100
00:10:13,520 --> 00:10:16,839
传闻这金色雷劫液来自古老的仙池

101
00:10:17,400 --> 00:10:19,399
喝下去对修行大有益

102
00:10:19,840 --> 00:10:20,799
如此神物

103
00:10:21,200 --> 00:10:23,119
怎能让他们几个小辈耗费

104
00:10:23,880 --> 00:10:24,719
交出雷劫液

105
00:10:26,680 --> 00:10:27,799
你们也想要

106
00:10:28,520 --> 00:10:30,039
那我也请你们喝一杯

107
00:10:51,840 --> 00:10:52,759
那雷劫液

108
00:10:52,960 --> 00:10:55,279
竟然可以消退仙古法力侵蚀

109
00:10:55,880 --> 00:10:56,839
至宝啊

110
00:10:57,400 --> 00:10:58,479
我等有救了

111
00:11:03,640 --> 00:11:04,719
交出雷劫液

112
00:11:06,640 --> 00:11:07,639
你我联手御敌

113
00:11:15,160 --> 00:11:17,319
我那暗伤纠缠半生

114
00:11:17,600 --> 00:11:18,959
得小友相助

115
00:11:19,200 --> 00:11:21,039
今日彻底脱离苦海

116
00:11:23,920 --> 00:11:26,919
绝不容任何人伤害小友

117
00:11:31,040 --> 00:11:32,119
他完全好了

118
00:11:32,960 --> 00:11:33,799
真的有用

119
00:11:34,120 --> 00:11:35,159
那更要抢啊

120
00:11:35,400 --> 00:11:37,279
可他已不受法力侵蚀之苦

121
00:11:37,680 --> 00:11:39,319
我等可无法全力战斗

122
00:11:41,480 --> 00:11:42,639
诸位无需再争

123
00:11:43,520 --> 00:11:44,439
雷劫液已无

124
00:11:45,440 --> 00:11:46,399
你们就算要抢

125
00:11:46,800 --> 00:11:47,439
也没机会了

126
00:11:49,160 --> 00:11:50,399
但只需我不死

127
00:11:51,040 --> 00:11:52,559
肯定还会渡劫

128
00:11:53,240 --> 00:11:54,079
雷劫液

129
00:11:54,840 --> 00:11:56,119
自然还会再现

130
00:11:56,960 --> 00:11:58,279
你敢胁迫我等

131
00:12:01,080 --> 00:12:01,479
小心

132
00:12:02,120 --> 00:12:03,039
敢动荒

133
00:12:03,400 --> 00:12:05,079
就是与我们仙古原住民为敌

134
00:12:07,360 --> 00:12:10,359
今后你就是我仙古原住民的贵客

135
00:12:11,400 --> 00:12:13,559
我族想邀你去祖地坐坐

136
00:12:13,880 --> 00:12:15,159
你们别和我族抢人

137
00:12:15,760 --> 00:12:16,959
这是我族的贵客

138
00:12:22,160 --> 00:12:23,439
此处圣地

139
00:12:23,720 --> 00:12:25,959
原本不可让外人踏足

140
00:12:26,440 --> 00:12:30,159
不过小友与祭灵古祖有缘

141
00:12:30,560 --> 00:12:32,239
又是我族恩人

142
00:12:32,840 --> 00:12:34,319
我族愿竭尽全力

143
00:12:34,840 --> 00:12:36,719
守护小友在此修行

144
00:12:37,120 --> 00:12:39,679
直至仙道擂台现世

145
00:13:03,520 --> 00:13:04,319
柳神

146
00:13:05,400 --> 00:13:06,279
我来了

147
00:13:18,400 --> 00:13:19,799
显化法相

148
00:13:20,360 --> 00:13:21,919
祖祭灵的枝 复苏了

149
00:13:28,960 --> 00:13:30,319
惊醒我的人

150
00:13:31,920 --> 00:13:33,319
尚有别人能惊醒您

151
00:13:39,080 --> 00:13:39,999
鼎

152
00:13:45,800 --> 00:13:47,039
那人究竟是谁

153
00:13:47,280 --> 00:13:48,159
自何方

154
00:13:49,040 --> 00:13:50,279
那人姓叶

155
00:13:50,600 --> 00:13:54,239
既不属于过去也不属于当世

156
00:13:55,360 --> 00:13:56,199
他为何而来

157
00:13:56,800 --> 00:13:57,999
得此柳条

158
00:13:58,280 --> 00:13:59,879
让我重获生机

159
00:14:00,440 --> 00:14:01,599
他的降临

160
00:14:02,120 --> 00:14:04,039
又助我超越极限

161
00:14:04,480 --> 00:14:05,799
得以显化

162
00:14:06,240 --> 00:14:07,839
然我并非真身

163
00:14:08,360 --> 00:14:09,639
记忆有限

164
00:14:10,960 --> 00:14:13,159
希望我有一关能真正遇见他

165
00:14:14,040 --> 00:14:14,959
当面问清楚

166
00:14:17,640 --> 00:14:19,439
你既已修至此境

167
00:14:20,720 --> 00:14:22,319
可知己身道途

168
00:14:22,720 --> 00:14:23,719
通往何方

169
00:14:27,240 --> 00:14:28,639
虚无缥缈

170
00:14:31,640 --> 00:14:32,439
最强

171
00:14:33,240 --> 00:14:34,719
好高鹜远

172
00:14:35,840 --> 00:14:36,479
长生

173
00:14:36,920 --> 00:14:38,479
以果为因

174
00:14:40,160 --> 00:14:41,239
你可知

175
00:14:41,800 --> 00:14:43,039
何谓真

176
00:14:46,760 --> 00:14:47,519
专注一途

177
00:14:48,160 --> 00:14:49,159
行于一道

178
00:14:51,480 --> 00:14:52,199
我懂了

179
00:14:54,200 --> 00:14:55,119
我之愿

180
00:14:57,920 --> 00:14:59,239
明己身之妙

181
00:15:03,440 --> 00:15:04,719
如何得悟

182
00:15:06,040 --> 00:15:07,559
您曾于石村涅重生

183
00:15:08,760 --> 00:15:10,079
我愿习您涅之法

184
00:15:11,000 --> 00:15:12,399
求横贯生死之道

185
00:15:13,880 --> 00:15:16,799
此术 涉生死之界

186
00:15:17,320 --> 00:15:19,279
须知得失相随

187
00:15:19,960 --> 00:15:21,279
死生相依

188
00:15:23,480 --> 00:15:24,559
弟子铭记于心

Dialogue: 0,0:00:12.65,0:00:14.04,Default,,0,0,0,,Tiga Energi Abadi mengelilingi tubuh
Dialogue: 0,0:00:14.65,0:00:17.19,Default,,0,0,0,,dapat menyerap sumber energi langit dan bumi untuk diri sendiri.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:18.25,0:00:19.49,Default,,0,0,0,,Kau memberi rintangan,
Dialogue: 0,0:00:20.05,0:00:21.39,Default,,0,0,0,,aku akan menerobos semuanya.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:27.05,0:00:28.89,Default,,0,0,0,,Bagaimana dia bisa bergerak bebas di wilayah petir?
Dialogue: 0,0:00:29.60,0:00:31.89,Default,,0,0,0,,Saudara, cepat bangun!
Dialogue: 0,0:00:42.50,0:00:44.54,Default,,0,0,0,,Meskipun kau memiliki tiga Energi Abadi,
Dialogue: 0,0:00:45.45,0:00:47.04,Default,,0,0,0,,tidak ada gunanya jika kau jatuh di sini.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:47.75,0:00:49.04,Default,,0,0,0,,Tubuhmu akan menjadi milikku.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:03.15,0:01:03.94,Default,,0,0,0,,Kau sudah tiba.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:04.60,0:01:05.79,Default,,0,0,0,,Dengar-dengar Huang dalam masalah.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:06.15,0:01:06.89,Default,,0,0,0,,Aku datang untuk membantu.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:07.90,0:01:08.74,Default,,0,0,0,,Itu tidak berguna.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:09.55,0:01:10.39,Default,,0,0,0,,Di dalam petaka,
Dialogue: 0,0:01:10.95,0:01:13.24,Default,,0,0,0,,kecuali orang yang bersembunyi di balik energi kematian,
Dialogue: 0,0:01:14.40,0:01:16.84,Default,,0,0,0,,serangan hanya akan menggores permukaan.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:17.60,0:01:18.79,Default,,0,0,0,,Tidak ada cara lain.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:26.75,0:01:28.39,Default,,0,0,0,,Seandainya kelinci kecil itu ada.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:28.80,0:01:30.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Mungkin dia punya ide gila.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:31.05,0:01:31.84,Default,,0,0,0,,Dia,
Dialogue: 0,0:01:32.35,0:01:34.04,Default,,0,0,0,,muncul saat ada makanan.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:34.30,0:01:35.94,Default,,0,0,0,,Hilang saat ada masalah.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:36.55,0:01:37.64,Default,,0,0,0,,Apa ide yang bisa dia miliki?
Dialogue: 0,0:01:38.20,0:01:39.44,Default,,0,0,0,,Walaupun ada secercah harapan,
Dialogue: 0,0:01:39.70,0:01:40.64,Default,,0,0,0,,dia tidak akan menyerah.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:56.45,0:01:58.14,Default,,0,0,0,,Apakah pantas menghadapi petaka dengan resiko besar?
Dialogue: 0,0:01:58.55,0:01:59.54,Default,,0,0,0,,Apakah itu layak?
Dialogue: 0,0:02:05.25,0:02:05.94,Default,,0,0,0,,Saudara Chang Gong,
Dialogue: 0,0:02:06.35,0:02:07.09,Default,,0,0,0,,aku ikut.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:35.85,0:02:39.99,Default,,0,0,0,,Kesalahanmu adalah mengusik Surga.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:44.95,0:02:46.14,Default,,0,0,0,,Dia telah bangun.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:54.85,0:02:55.24,Default,,0,0,0,,Ah.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:56.10,0:02:57.59,Default,,0,0,0,,Mengapa dia jadi tampak tua?
Dialogue: 0,0:02:58.25,0:02:58.74,Default,,0,0,0,,Gendut.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:59.30,0:03:00.44,Default,,0,0,0,,Apa matamu?
Dialogue: 0,0:03:01.30,0:03:02.94,Default,,0,0,0,,Ini adalah Tetua suku Delapan Lengan.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:03.00,0:03:04.04,Default,,0,0,0,,Pembantu yang aku panggil.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:09.00,0:03:10.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Dia adalah orang yang kau cari.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:12.00,0:03:14.14,Default,,0,0,0,,Mereka teringat pada Huang yang telah memberi mereka ranting willow.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:15.00,0:03:16.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Mereka mau membantu.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:16.95,0:03:18.39,Default,,0,0,0,,Aku bilang pasti kau punya rencana.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:21.40,0:03:22.54,Default,,0,0,0,,Hanya saja, takut Tetua ini...
Dialogue: 0,0:03:22.85,0:03:24.84,Default,,0,0,0,,akan menggunakan tubuh {\i1}Heavenly Deity{\i0} untuk menerobos wilayah petir.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:25.15,0:03:25.94,Default,,0,0,0,,tidak akan bertahan lama.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:30.85,0:03:32.19,Default,,0,0,0,,Demi orang luar,
Dialogue: 0,0:03:32.25,0:03:33.54,Default,,0,0,0,,nekat menghadapi petaka.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:34.90,0:03:36.84,Default,,0,0,0,,Apa keuntungan yang kau dapatkan dari mereka?
Dialogue: 0,0:03:39.65,0:03:42.74,Default,,0,0,0,,Orang ini adalah penyelamat dari keturunan Ancient Immortal.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:43.65,0:03:45.69,Default,,0,0,0,,Aku tidak akan membiarkanmu menyakiti dia.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:54.30,0:03:55.54,Default,,0,0,0,,Hahaha.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:56.40,0:03:58.54,Default,,0,0,0,,Kupikir kau punya cara khusus.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:59.20,0:04:01.54,Default,,0,0,0,,Ternyata hanya bertahan dari pengikisan Ancient Immortal.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:02.05,0:04:03.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Memaksakan diri keluar.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:15.65,0:04:16.79,Default,,0,0,0,,Jika makhluk di belakang itu,
Dialogue: 0,0:04:17.20,0:04:18.39,Default,,0,0,0,,tahu kapan harus mundur, itu yang terbaik.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:19.55,0:04:21.54,Default,,0,0,0,,Agar tidak benar-benar menjadi masalah lebih besar.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:38.85,0:04:40.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Sepertinya, aku harus bertarung.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:45.25,0:04:47.04,Default,,0,0,0,,Di sini, jiwa-jiwa telah terkurung bertahun-tahun.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:48.15,0:04:49.09,Default,,0,0,0,,Mereka sangat membutuhkan energi Dao.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:49.15,0:04:50.44,Default,,0,0,0,,Semua merasa sangat terdesak.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:51.90,0:04:53.44,Default,,0,0,0,,Aku tidak percaya kau mengabaikannya.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:49.95,0:05:51.89,Default,,0,0,0,,Dua monster memakan segala sesuatu.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:52.65,0:05:54.09,Default,,0,0,0,,Saatnya pergi saat mereka bertarung.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:54.35,0:05:55.14,Default,,0,0,0,,Kabur dari sini.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:07.05,0:06:07.74,Default,,0,0,0,,Hancurkan!
Dialogue: 0,0:06:18.45,0:06:21.44,Default,,0,0,0,,Petaka sembilan lapis telah berlalu.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:24.65,0:06:26.09,Default,,0,0,0,,Aku rasa tidak ada yang bisa menghentikanku.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:26.30,0:06:27.54,Default,,0,0,0,,Kau akan mati!
Dialogue: 0,0:06:27.95,0:06:28.59,Default,,0,0,0,,Tidak!
Dialogue: 0,0:06:37.90,0:06:39.09,Default,,0,0,0,,Yang seharusnya mati,
Dialogue: 0,0:06:39.50,0:06:40.44,Default,,0,0,0,,adalah kau!
Dialogue: 0,0:06:49.75,0:06:50.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Beku!
Dialogue: 0,0:07:21.60,0:07:22.94,Default,,0,0,0,,Terima kasih, senior, telah mengambil risiko besar
Dialogue: 0,0:07:23.15,0:07:24.49,Default,,0,0,0,,untuk memperpanjang waktu untukku.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:25.05,0:07:25.89,Default,,0,0,0,,Kalian jaga senior dulu.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:26.75,0:07:27.84,Default,,0,0,0,,Aku akan ambil Cairan Petaka Langit.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:37.65,0:07:39.44,Default,,0,0,0,,Aku mendengar bahwa Petaka Langit ada sembilan tahap maksimum,
Dialogue: 0,0:07:40.05,0:07:41.29,Default,,0,0,0,,sepuluh kualitas sempurna.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:42.70,0:07:44.14,Default,,0,0,0,,Sepertinya apa yang aku hadapi hari ini
Dialogue: 0,0:07:44.70,0:07:46.19,Default,,0,0,0,,adalah Petaka yang kesepuluh.
Dialogue: 0,0:08:03.35,0:08:06.84,Default,,0,0,0,,Tak kusangka, lapisan atas wilayah petir ini begitu penuh kehidupan.
Dialogue: 0,0:08:10.25,0:08:12.24,Default,,0,0,0,,Pangkalan Pemotong Abadi ini bukan tempat terakhir?
Dialogue: 0,0:08:22.95,0:08:25.99,Default,,0,0,0,,Sepertinya kekuatanku masih belum cukup untuk menarik perhatiannya.
Dialogue: 0,0:08:36.40,0:08:37.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Berkilau keemasan.
Dialogue: 0,0:08:38.60,0:08:41.04,Default,,0,0,0,,Tidak tahu apa perbedaan dengan Cairan Petaka Ungu sebelumnya.
Dialogue: 0,0:08:46.85,0:08:48.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Lebih pekat dan lebih halus.
Dialogue: 0,0:08:48.85,0:08:49.54,Default,,0,0,0,,Satu tetes
Dialogue: 0,0:08:50.45,0:08:52.89,Default,,0,0,0,,setara dengan segenggam Cairan Petaka Ungu sebelumnya.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:08.75,0:09:09.54,Default,,0,0,0,,Gendut!
Dialogue: 0,0:09:10.15,0:09:10.94,Default,,0,0,0,,Kau bilang orang tua itu
Dialogue: 0,0:09:10.95,0:09:11.94,Default,,0,0,0,,tidak akan terluka, kan?
Dialogue: 0,0:09:12.80,0:09:14.74,Default,,0,0,0,,Jika dia benar-benar mati di sini,
Dialogue: 0,0:09:15.35,0:09:17.64,Default,,0,0,0,,apa yang harus aku katakan pada suku Delapan Lengan?
Dialogue: 0,0:09:17.95,0:09:19.14,Default,,0,0,0,,Satu nyawa untuk satu nyawa.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:19.90,0:09:20.84,Default,,0,0,0,,Biarkan kau pergi untuk meminta maaf.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:21.70,0:09:22.09,Default,,0,0,0,,Tidak.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:22.35,0:09:23.44,Default,,0,0,0,,Lebih baik kirim kau.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:23.55,0:09:24.44,Default,,0,0,0,,Akan lebih menguntungkan.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:34.05,0:09:35.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Kalian masih berani maju?
Dialogue: 0,0:09:35.40,0:09:37.94,Default,,0,0,0,,Tidakkah takut Huang akan menangkap kalian semua?
Dialogue: 0,0:09:38.55,0:09:40.39,Default,,0,0,0,,Kami, lebih dari sepuluh {\i1}Heavenly Deity{\i0} berada di sini.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:40.85,0:09:43.10,Default,,0,0,0,,Dia tidak memiliki petaka yang bisa diandalkan.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:43.90,0:09:45.54,Default,,0,0,0,,Apa artinya tiga Energi Abadi itu?
Dialogue: 0,0:09:46.25,0:09:47.29,Default,,0,0,0,,Mau bagaimana pun,
Dialogue: 0,0:09:47.60,0:09:50.14,Default,,0,0,0,,dia hanyalah seorang pemuda di {\i1}True Self Realm{\i0}.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:00.55,0:10:01.69,Default,,0,0,0,,Dengan kalian semua,
Dialogue: 0,0:10:14.40,0:10:17.74,Default,,0,0,0,,Kabarnya Cairan Petaka Emas ini berasal dari kolam Abadi kuno.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:18.30,0:10:20.29,Default,,0,0,0,,Meminumnya sangat bermanfaat untuk kultivasi.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:20.75,0:10:21.64,Default,,0,0,0,,Obat sakti ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:10:22.10,0:10:23.99,Default,,0,0,0,,bagaimana bisa disia-siakan oleh kaum muda?
Dialogue: 0,0:10:24.60,0:10:25.64,Default,,0,0,0,,Serahkan Cairan Petaka itu.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:27.55,0:10:28.69,Default,,0,0,0,,Kalian juga menginginkannya?
Dialogue: 0,0:10:29.40,0:10:30.94,Default,,0,0,0,,Kalau begitu, aku akan menyuguhkan kalian.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:52.85,0:10:53.79,Default,,0,0,0,,Cairan Petaka itu
Dialogue: 0,0:10:54.00,0:10:56.29,Default,,0,0,0,,dapat mengurangi pengikisan kekuatan Ancient Immortal.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:56.90,0:10:57.84,Default,,0,0,0,,Harta berharga!
Dialogue: 0,0:10:58.45,0:10:59.49,Default,,0,0,0,,Kami selamat!
Dialogue: 0,0:11:03.70,0:11:04.19,Default,,0,0,0,,Anak muda,
Dialogue: 0,0:11:04.65,0:11:05.74,Default,,0,0,0,,serahkan Cairan Petaka itu.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:06.60,0:11:07.14,Default,,0,0,0,,Saudara Huang,
Dialogue: 0,0:11:07.65,0:11:08.69,Default,,0,0,0,,Kita berdua bersatu melawan musuh.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:16.20,0:11:18.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Luka batinku selama bertahun-tahun,
Dialogue: 0,0:11:18.65,0:11:20.04,Default,,0,0,0,,dapat teratasi dengan bantuanmu.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:20.25,0:11:22.04,Default,,0,0,0,,Hari ini kita bisa terbebas dari penyiksaan.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:23.20,0:11:24.54,Default,,0,0,0,,Hari ini, aku ada di sini,
Dialogue: 0,0:11:24.95,0:11:27.99,Default,,0,0,0,,aku tidak akan membiarkan siapa pun menyakiti kalian.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:32.10,0:11:33.14,Default,,0,0,0,,Dia benar-benar sudah sembuh.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:34.05,0:11:34.84,Default,,0,0,0,,Ini benar-benar bermanfaat.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:35.15,0:11:36.19,Default,,0,0,0,,Kalau gitu, kita perlu merebutnya.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:36.45,0:11:38.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Tapi dia sudah tidak menderita pengikisan.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:38.75,0:11:40.39,Default,,0,0,0,,Kami tidak bisa bertarung dengan kekuatan penuhnya.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:42.50,0:11:43.69,Default,,0,0,0,,Tidak perlu saling memperebutkan.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:44.55,0:11:45.49,Default,,0,0,0,,Cairan Petaka sudah tidak ada.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:46.50,0:11:47.44,Default,,0,0,0,,Jika kalian ingin merampas,
Dialogue: 0,0:11:47.85,0:11:48.49,Default,,0,0,0,,tidak ada kesempatan.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:50.20,0:11:51.44,Default,,0,0,0,,Asalkan aku tidak mati,
Dialogue: 0,0:11:52.05,0:11:53.59,Default,,0,0,0,,di masa depan pasti ada petaka lagi.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:54.30,0:11:55.14,Default,,0,0,0,,Cairan Petaka itu
Dialogue: 0,0:11:55.90,0:11:57.14,Default,,0,0,0,,pasti akan muncul kembali.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:58.00,0:11:59.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Berani mengancam kami?
Dialogue: 0,0:12:02.15,0:12:02.74,Default,,0,0,0,,hati-hati!
Dialogue: 0,0:12:03.15,0:12:04.09,Default,,0,0,0,,Jika kau berani menyentuh Huang,
Dialogue: 0,0:12:04.45,0:12:06.45,Default,,0,0,0,,berarti kau berhadapan dengan kami, penduduk Ancient Immortal.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:07.35,0:12:08.14,Default,,0,0,0,,Anak muda,
Dialogue: 0,0:12:08.45,0:12:11.39,Default,,0,0,0,,Mulai sekarang, kau adalah tamu terhormat bagi kami penduduk Ancient Immortal.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:12.45,0:12:14.59,Default,,0,0,0,,Suku kami ingin mengundangmu ke tanah leluhur.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:14.95,0:12:16.24,Default,,0,0,0,,Jangan rebut tamu kami.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:16.80,0:12:17.99,Default,,0,0,0,,Dia adalah tamu terhormat kami.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:23.20,0:12:24.44,Default,,0,0,0,,Tempat suci ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:12:24.75,0:12:26.99,Default,,0,0,0,,awalnya tidak boleh dimasuki oleh orang luar.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:27.45,0:12:31.19,Default,,0,0,0,,Namun, anak muda memiliki ikatan dengan leluhur.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:31.65,0:12:33.24,Default,,0,0,0,,Dan juga merupakan penyelamat bagi suku kami.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:33.85,0:12:35.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Kami bersedia mengorbankan segalanya
Dialogue: 0,0:12:35.85,0:12:37.74,Default,,0,0,0,,untuk melindungi kalian saat berlatih di sini.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:38.15,0:12:40.74,Default,,0,0,0,,Sampai Dao Abadi dihadapkan di dunia.
Dialogue: 0,0:13:04.55,0:13:05.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Dewa Willow,
Dialogue: 0,0:13:06.45,0:13:07.34,Default,,0,0,0,,aku datang!
Dialogue: 0,0:13:19.45,0:13:20.84,Default,,0,0,0,,Memunculkan wujud Dharma.
Dialogue: 0,0:13:21.40,0:13:22.94,Default,,0,0,0,,Cabang-cabang leluhur mulai bangkit.
Dialogue: 0,0:13:27.90,0:13:29.04,Default,,0,0,0,,Kau adalah yang kedua
Dialogue: 0,0:13:30.00,0:13:31.34,Default,,0,0,0,,yang membangunkanku.
Dialogue: 0,0:13:32.95,0:13:34.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Ada yang lain yang bisa membangunkanmu?
Dialogue: 0,0:13:35.25,0:13:37.94,Default,,0,0,0,,Ada seseorang datang membawa guci.
Dialogue: 0,0:13:40.15,0:13:41.04,Default,,0,0,0,,Guci?
Dialogue: 0,0:13:45.05,0:13:45.94,Default,,0,0,0,,Mungkinkah dia?
Dialogue: 0,0:13:47.00,0:13:48.04,Default,,0,0,0,,Siapa sebenarnya orang ini?
Dialogue: 0,0:13:48.35,0:13:49.24,Default,,0,0,0,,Dari mana asalnya?
Dialogue: 0,0:13:50.10,0:13:51.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Orang itu bernama Ye.
Dialogue: 0,0:13:51.65,0:13:55.29,Default,,0,0,0,,Dia tidak berasal dari masa lalu atau masa kini.
Dialogue: 0,0:13:56.45,0:13:57.24,Default,,0,0,0,,Mengapa dia datang?
Dialogue: 0,0:13:57.85,0:13:59.04,Default,,0,0,0,,Mengambil cabang ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:13:59.35,0:14:00.94,Default,,0,0,0,,memungkinkan aku hidup kembali.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:01.50,0:14:02.64,Default,,0,0,0,,Kedatangannya
Dialogue: 0,0:14:03.15,0:14:05.09,Default,,0,0,0,,membantuku melampaui batas.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:05.55,0:14:06.84,Default,,0,0,0,,Dapat terealisasi.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:07.30,0:14:08.89,Default,,0,0,0,,Namun, aku bukan wujud asli.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:09.45,0:14:10.69,Default,,0,0,0,,Ingatanku terbatas.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:12.05,0:14:14.24,Default,,0,0,0,,Ku harap suatu hari aku bisa benar-benar bertemu dengannya.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:15.10,0:14:16.04,Default,,0,0,0,,Tanya langsung.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:16.80,0:14:17.94,Default,,0,0,0,,{\i1}True Self Realm.{\i0}
Dialogue: 0,0:14:18.70,0:14:20.55,Default,,0,0,0,,Karena kamu telah mencapai tingkat ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:14:21.80,0:14:23.55,Default,,0,0,0,,apakah kamu mengetahui jalan hidupmu,
Dialogue: 0,0:14:23.80,0:14:24.79,Default,,0,0,0,,Akan ke mana?
Dialogue: 0,0:14:26.20,0:14:27.05,Default,,0,0,0,,{\i1}Melepaskan diri.{\i0}
Dialogue: 0,0:14:28.30,0:14:29.69,Default,,0,0,0,,{\i1}Hampa dan kabur.{\i0}
Dialogue: 0,0:14:32.70,0:14:33.49,Default,,0,0,0,,{\i1}Yang terkuat.{\i0}
Dialogue: 0,0:14:34.35,0:14:35.79,Default,,0,0,0,,{\i1}Sangat tinggi dan jauh.{\i0}
Dialogue: 0,0:14:36.90,0:14:37.54,Default,,0,0,0,,{\i1}Kekekalan.{\i0}
Dialogue: 0,0:14:38.00,0:14:39.54,Default,,0,0,0,,{\i1}Dengan buah menjadi sebab{\i0}.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:41.25,0:14:42.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Apakah kau tahu,
Dialogue: 0,0:14:42.85,0:14:44.09,Default,,0,0,0,,apa itu kebenaran?
Dialogue: 0,0:14:47.85,0:14:48.59,Default,,0,0,0,,Tekuni satu jalan,
Dialogue: 0,0:14:49.25,0:14:50.24,Default,,0,0,0,,berjalan di satu jalan.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:52.55,0:14:53.29,Default,,0,0,0,,Aku mengerti.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:55.30,0:14:56.19,Default,,0,0,0,,Keinginanku
Dialogue: 0,0:14:57.10,0:14:58.54,Default,,0,0,0,,adalah untuk memahami antara hidup dan mati,
Dialogue: 0,0:14:59.00,0:15:00.29,Default,,0,0,0,,memahami keajaiban diriku.
Dialogue: 0,0:15:04.50,0:15:05.79,Default,,0,0,0,,Bagaimana cara memahaminya?
Dialogue: 0,0:15:07.15,0:15:08.64,Default,,0,0,0,,Kau telah menjalani reinkarnasi di Desa Batu.
Dialogue: 0,0:15:09.85,0:15:11.14,Default,,0,0,0,,Aku ingin mempelajari cara reinkarnasimu.
Dialogue: 0,0:15:12.05,0:15:13.49,Default,,0,0,0,,Mencari jalan menembus hidup dan mati.
Dialogue: 0,0:15:14.95,0:15:17.89,Default,,0,0,0,,Teknik ini berhubungan dengan batas kehidupan dan mati.
Dialogue: 0,0:15:18.40,0:15:20.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Harus ada yang dipahami tentang keuntungan dan kerugian.
Dialogue: 0,0:15:21.05,0:15:22.34,Default,,0,0,0,,Hidup dan mati saling bergantung.
Dialogue: 0,0:15:24.55,0:15:25.64,Default,,0,0,0,,Murid akan mengingat ini di hati.

srt:
1
00:00:12,680 --> 00:00:14,079
三道仙气绕体

2
00:00:14,640 --> 00:00:17,199
自可擢取天地本源补充己身

3
00:00:18,240 --> 00:00:19,519
你有重重险关

4
00:00:20,040 --> 00:00:21,399
我便闯关夺隘

5
00:00:27,080 --> 00:00:28,879
他怎能在雷域畅行无阻

6
00:00:29,600 --> 00:00:31,879
好兄弟你快醒过来啊

7
00:00:42,520 --> 00:00:44,559
修出三道仙气又如何

8
00:00:45,480 --> 00:00:47,039
还不是殒落于此

9
00:00:47,760 --> 00:00:49,079
肉身为我所得

10
00:01:03,120 --> 00:01:03,839
你也来了

11
00:01:04,560 --> 00:01:05,759
听闻荒兄有难

12
00:01:09,520 --> 00:01:10,359
雷劫之内

13
00:01:10,840 --> 00:01:13,159
除了眼前那借死气藏身的家伙

14
00:01:14,320 --> 00:01:16,759
攻击只是隔靴搔痒

15
00:01:17,520 --> 00:01:18,719
就没有别的办法了

16
00:01:26,640 --> 00:01:28,319
要是那小兔子在就好了

17
00:01:28,720 --> 00:01:30,279
说不定能有什么鬼主意

18
00:01:31,000 --> 00:01:31,799
她

19
00:01:32,240 --> 00:01:33,959
到吃东西就出现

20
00:01:34,200 --> 00:01:35,759
到有事就消失

21
00:01:36,320 --> 00:01:37,599
她能有什么主意

22
00:01:39,600 --> 00:01:40,559
也不言弃

23
00:01:56,360 --> 00:01:58,039
冒死强闯雷劫

24
00:01:58,480 --> 00:01:58,839
值得吗

25
00:02:05,160 --> 00:02:05,999
长弓兄

26
00:02:06,280 --> 00:02:07,039
算我一个

27
00:02:35,560 --> 00:02:39,719
你错就错在不该得罪天国

28
00:02:44,640 --> 00:02:45,839
他醒过来了

29
00:02:54,560 --> 00:02:55,359
啊

30
00:02:55,840 --> 00:02:57,319
这怎么还变老了

31
00:02:58,480 --> 00:02:58,759
胖子

32
00:02:59,000 --> 00:03:00,159
你什么眼神

33
00:03:01,000 --> 00:03:02,679
这是八臂魂族长老

34
00:03:02,720 --> 00:03:03,799
我搬来的救兵

35
00:03:08,720 --> 00:03:10,039
是你找来的

36
00:03:11,720 --> 00:03:13,839
他们念在荒曾赐还柳枝

37
00:03:14,560 --> 00:03:15,919
愿意出手相助

38
00:03:16,480 --> 00:03:17,959
我就说你一定有主意

39
00:03:20,960 --> 00:03:22,079
只怕这长老

40
00:03:22,440 --> 00:03:24,439
以天神之躯擅闯雷域

41
00:03:24,680 --> 00:03:25,479
撑不了多久

42
00:03:30,440 --> 00:03:31,759
为了个外人

43
00:03:31,800 --> 00:03:33,079
强闯雷劫

44
00:03:34,440 --> 00:03:36,399
你收了他们什么好处

45
00:03:39,160 --> 00:03:42,319
此人乃是众仙古遗族的恩人

46
00:03:43,200 --> 00:03:45,239
绝不容你伤他

47
00:03:53,840 --> 00:03:55,079
哈哈哈

48
00:03:55,960 --> 00:03:58,079
还以为你有什么特殊手段

49
00:03:58,760 --> 00:04:01,079
不过是顶着仙古法力侵蚀

50
00:04:15,200 --> 00:04:16,359
若是身后那东西

51
00:04:16,760 --> 00:04:17,958
能知难而退最好

52
00:04:19,120 --> 00:04:21,119
免得真惹出什么更大的麻烦

53
00:04:38,360 --> 00:04:39,879
看来不拼是不行了

54
00:04:44,800 --> 00:04:46,559
此处元神皆被困千万载

55
00:04:47,680 --> 00:04:48,599
对仙道气息之补充

56
00:04:48,680 --> 00:04:49,999
皆是如饥似渴

57
00:04:51,440 --> 00:04:52,959
我不信你无动于衷

58
00:05:49,480 --> 00:05:51,439
两只怪物皆予吞噬一切

59
00:05:52,200 --> 00:05:53,639
正好趁二虎相争

60
00:05:53,880 --> 00:05:54,639
逃离此处

61
00:06:06,600 --> 00:06:07,239
破

62
00:06:18,000 --> 00:06:20,959
九重天劫已过

63
00:06:24,160 --> 00:06:25,639
我看还有何人能拦我

64
00:06:25,840 --> 00:06:27,079
你受死吧

65
00:06:27,440 --> 00:06:28,159
不

66
00:06:37,440 --> 00:06:38,559
该受死的

67
00:06:39,040 --> 00:06:39,959
是你

68
00:06:49,280 --> 00:06:50,079
定

69
00:07:21,080 --> 00:07:22,439
多谢前辈冒偌大风险

70
00:07:22,640 --> 00:07:23,999
替我拖延时间

71
00:07:24,520 --> 00:07:25,399
你们先照顾前辈

72
00:07:26,240 --> 00:07:27,359
我要去取雷劫液

73
00:07:37,160 --> 00:07:38,959
曾闻天劫有九之极尽

74
00:07:39,520 --> 00:07:40,799
十境完美之说

75
00:07:42,200 --> 00:07:43,679
看来今日所遇

76
00:07:44,200 --> 00:07:45,719
就是十重之劫了

77
00:08:02,800 --> 00:08:06,359
没想到雷域顶层竟是如此生机盘然

78
00:08:09,760 --> 00:08:11,759
这斩仙台莫不是最后一关

79
00:08:22,400 --> 00:08:25,479
看来我的实力还不足以惊动它

80
00:08:37,720 --> 00:08:40,158
不知与上次的紫色雷劫液有何区别

81
00:08:45,960 --> 00:08:47,439
更加精华凝练

82
00:08:49,560 --> 00:08:51,839
就抵得上过去一团紫色雷劫液

83
00:09:07,840 --> 00:09:08,679
胖子

84
00:09:10,040 --> 00:09:11,039
不会怎么样吧

85
00:09:11,920 --> 00:09:13,839
他要是真殒命于此

86
00:09:14,440 --> 00:09:16,799
我可怎么向八臂魂族交代啊

87
00:09:17,080 --> 00:09:18,239
一命换一命呗

88
00:09:19,000 --> 00:09:19,999
把你押去谢罪

89
00:09:20,800 --> 00:09:21,199
不

90
00:09:21,480 --> 00:09:22,559
不如把你送过去

91
00:09:22,640 --> 00:09:23,559
还多几斤肉

92
00:09:33,160 --> 00:09:34,439
你们还敢上前

93
00:09:34,520 --> 00:09:37,039
就不怕荒待会将你们一网打尽嘛

94
00:09:37,680 --> 00:09:39,519
我们数十位天神在列

95
00:09:39,960 --> 00:09:41,679
他又再无天劫可依

96
00:09:43,040 --> 00:09:44,679
三道仙气又如何

97
00:09:45,400 --> 00:09:46,399
说到底

98
00:09:46,720 --> 00:09:49,239
不过是一个真神境的小子罢了

99
00:09:59,640 --> 00:10:00,799
就凭你们

100
00:10:13,520 --> 00:10:16,839
传闻这金色雷劫液来自古老的仙池

101
00:10:17,400 --> 00:10:19,399
喝下去对修行大有益

102
00:10:19,840 --> 00:10:20,799
如此神物

103
00:10:21,200 --> 00:10:23,119
怎能让他们几个小辈耗费

104
00:10:23,880 --> 00:10:24,719
交出雷劫液

105
00:10:26,680 --> 00:10:27,799
你们也想要

106
00:10:28,520 --> 00:10:30,039
那我也请你们喝一杯

107
00:10:51,840 --> 00:10:52,759
那雷劫液

108
00:10:52,960 --> 00:10:55,279
竟然可以消退仙古法力侵蚀

109
00:10:55,880 --> 00:10:56,839
至宝啊

110
00:10:57,400 --> 00:10:58,479
我等有救了

111
00:11:03,640 --> 00:11:04,719
交出雷劫液

112
00:11:06,640 --> 00:11:07,639
你我联手御敌

113
00:11:15,160 --> 00:11:17,319
我那暗伤纠缠半生

114
00:11:17,600 --> 00:11:18,959
得小友相助

115
00:11:19,200 --> 00:11:21,039
今日彻底脱离苦海

116
00:11:23,920 --> 00:11:26,919
绝不容任何人伤害小友

117
00:11:31,040 --> 00:11:32,119
他完全好了

118
00:11:32,960 --> 00:11:33,799
真的有用

119
00:11:34,120 --> 00:11:35,159
那更要抢啊

120
00:11:35,400 --> 00:11:37,279
可他已不受法力侵蚀之苦

121
00:11:37,680 --> 00:11:39,319
我等可无法全力战斗

122
00:11:41,480 --> 00:11:42,639
诸位无需再争

123
00:11:43,520 --> 00:11:44,439
雷劫液已无

124
00:11:45,440 --> 00:11:46,399
你们就算要抢

125
00:11:46,800 --> 00:11:47,439
也没机会了

126
00:11:49,160 --> 00:11:50,399
但只需我不死

127
00:11:51,040 --> 00:11:52,559
肯定还会渡劫

128
00:11:53,240 --> 00:11:54,079
雷劫液

129
00:11:54,840 --> 00:11:56,119
自然还会再现

130
00:11:56,960 --> 00:11:58,279
你敢胁迫我等

131
00:12:01,080 --> 00:12:01,479
小心

132
00:12:02,120 --> 00:12:03,039
敢动荒

133
00:12:03,400 --> 00:12:05,079
就是与我们仙古原住民为敌

134
00:12:07,360 --> 00:12:10,359
今后你就是我仙古原住民的贵客

135
00:12:11,400 --> 00:12:13,559
我族想邀你去祖地坐坐

136
00:12:13,880 --> 00:12:15,159
你们别和我族抢人

137
00:12:15,760 --> 00:12:16,959
这是我族的贵客

138
00:12:22,160 --> 00:12:23,439
此处圣地

139
00:12:23,720 --> 00:12:25,959
原本不可让外人踏足

140
00:12:26,440 --> 00:12:30,159
不过小友与祭灵古祖有缘

141
00:12:30,560 --> 00:12:32,239
又是我族恩人

142
00:12:32,840 --> 00:12:34,319
我族愿竭尽全力

143
00:12:34,840 --> 00:12:36,719
守护小友在此修行

144
00:12:37,120 --> 00:12:39,679
直至仙道擂台现世

145
00:13:03,520 --> 00:13:04,319
柳神

146
00:13:05,400 --> 00:13:06,279
我来了

147
00:13:18,400 --> 00:13:19,799
显化法相

148
00:13:20,360 --> 00:13:21,919
祖祭灵的枝 复苏了

149
00:13:28,960 --> 00:13:30,319
惊醒我的人

150
00:13:31,920 --> 00:13:33,319
尚有别人能惊醒您

151
00:13:39,080 --> 00:13:39,999
鼎

152
00:13:45,800 --> 00:13:47,039
那人究竟是谁

153
00:13:47,280 --> 00:13:48,159
自何方

154
00:13:49,040 --> 00:13:50,279
那人姓叶

155
00:13:50,600 --> 00:13:54,239
既不属于过去也不属于当世

156
00:13:55,360 --> 00:13:56,199
他为何而来

157
00:13:56,800 --> 00:13:57,999
得此柳条

158
00:13:58,280 --> 00:13:59,879
让我重获生机

159
00:14:00,440 --> 00:14:01,599
他的降临

160
00:14:02,120 --> 00:14:04,039
又助我超越极限

161
00:14:04,480 --> 00:14:05,799
得以显化

162
00:14:06,240 --> 00:14:07,839
然我并非真身

163
00:14:08,360 --> 00:14:09,639
记忆有限

164
00:14:10,960 --> 00:14:13,159
希望我有一关能真正遇见他

165
00:14:14,040 --> 00:14:14,959
当面问清楚

166
00:14:17,640 --> 00:14:19,439
你既已修至此境

167
00:14:20,720 --> 00:14:22,319
可知己身道途

168
00:14:22,720 --> 00:14:23,719
通往何方

169
00:14:27,240 --> 00:14:28,639
虚无缥缈

170
00:14:31,640 --> 00:14:32,439
最强

171
00:14:33,240 --> 00:14:34,719
好高鹜远

172
00:14:35,840 --> 00:14:36,479
长生

173
00:14:36,920 --> 00:14:38,479
以果为因

174
00:14:40,160 --> 00:14:41,239
你可知

175
00:14:41,800 --> 00:14:43,039
何谓真

176
00:14:46,760 --> 00:14:47,519
专注一途

177
00:14:48,160 --> 00:14:49,159
行于一道

178
00:14:51,480 --> 00:14:52,199
我懂了

179
00:14:54,200 --> 00:14:55,119
我之愿

180
00:14:57,920 --> 00:14:59,239
明己身之妙

181
00:15:03,440 --> 00:15:04,719
如何得悟

182
00:15:06,040 --> 00:15:07,559
您曾于石村涅重生

183
00:15:08,760 --> 00:15:10,079
我愿习您涅之法

184
00:15:11,000 --> 00:15:12,399
求横贯生死之道

185
00:15:13,880 --> 00:15:16,799
此术 涉生死之界

186
00:15:17,320 --> 00:15:19,279
须知得失相随

187
00:15:19,960 --> 00:15:21,279
死生相依

188
00:15:23,480 --> 00:15:24,559
弟子铭记于心

/pw ganti bahasa dari file srt berikut ke indonesia ambil dari .ass yang saya kirim, ikuti timestamp dari srt:
